Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brothers_from_the_Walled_City" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brothers_from_the_Walled_City</a>

Brothers Xiao De and Da De lives within the confines of the Walled City, running wild on the streets and not thoroughly working hard at school. Their father (Kwan Hoi-San) is a respected and feared figure in the seedy community but is one day stabbed to death by a drug addict.
 The boys grow up (now portrayed by Chin Siu-Ho and Phillip Ko respectively), staying with their original living ground and the nightlife surrounding it.
 Xiao De is the one continuing spiraling out of control, despite Da De's constant desire for his brother to put another spin to his direction in life...
